entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
